p: The gas-chromatography (GC) analysis was performed using a Varian CP-3800 equipped with a FID detector, interfaced with a fused-silica column (CP-Sil 8CB, 50 m × 0.25 mm, film thickness 0.12 μm) under following condition: oven temperature 50-250 °C with the rate of 3 °C/min; injector temperature 260 °C, split ratio 1:5, with carrier gas, N 2 flow rate 2 mL/min; detector temperature 280 °C.
